document.full_text: the commander of the pakistani naval base attacked by militants on sunday was relieved of his command on wednesday, the navy said in a statement, a rare sign of accountability in the powerful military establishment.
document.title: commander of attacked pakistani naval base relieved of command
lines_and_colors: the commander of the pakistani naval base attacked by militants on sunday was relieved of his command on wednesday, the navy said in a statement, a rare sign of accountability in the powerful military establishment.
